title: We address the cracks in our foundation
description: I’m sitting you down and asking you to draft a definition of “news in the public interest.” How long do you think you would need? And how confident in your answer would feel? Or, if I came to you, despondent and unsure what might make news essential, or even useful (I have been there!). Where...
